meanings.definition: In any case; at any rate.
meanings.sent1: Anyways, I will go to the store later.
meanings.sent2: She decided to go anyways, despite the rain.
meanings.sent3: He wore a funny hat to the party, but anyways, he had a great time.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like sunshine, anyways.
meanings.sent5: The cat always finds a way to escape, anyways.

meanings.definition: In any manner or respect; at all.
meanings.sent1: I can't understand this math problem anyways.
meanings.sent2: He didn't care about the rules and did it anyways.
meanings.sent3: The dog tried to wear sunglasses, but they kept falling off anyways.
meanings.sent4: His words cut through the silence like a knife, anyways.
meanings.sent5: The flowers bloomed beautifully in the garden, anyways.

meanings.definition: In any event; in any case.
meanings.sent1: Anyways, we should be prepared for the meeting.
meanings.sent2: She forgot her umbrella, but she went anyways.
meanings.sent3: The clown juggled bananas and oranges, but anyways, the kids loved it.
meanings.sent4: The storm raged outside, but inside, they danced anyways.
meanings.sent5: The old tree stood tall and proud, anyways.
